wifen.server.network

Interface ServerListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClientApplication

    public interface ServerListener
    Super interface for all entities interested in events fired from Servers.
    Author:
    Konstantin Schaper (pbg2h14ash)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void handle(ServerEvent event)
      Called on the implementing class when the specified type of event is fired on the server to which this listener has been added.

    • Method Detail

      • handle

        void handle(ServerEvent event)
        Called on the implementing class when the specified type of event is fired on the server to which this listener has been added.
        Parameters:
        event - The event which has been fired
